title: IAA Tonight | What if Kevin Durant was Traded for LeBron James?
description: With all the crazy moves that have occured in this NBA offseason, what if we had another one involving perhaps the two best players currently in the league? A proposed Kevin Durant for LeBron James trade could go down as the biggest in NBA history, and Brandon Marshall, Omar Kelly and Auntie Chantel Tremitiere discuss whether both teams should explore it. Plus, an anonymous NFL offensive coach said Saquon Barkley ‘doesn’t know how to play running back.’ Is he correct in his assessment?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Brandon Marshall, Omar Kelly, Auntie Chantel Tremitiere)
